favourite.article: I like this song very much because it is very helpful to the children's meetings and there is enjoyment.
Amen!!! I love this song. Man and everything in this world were created by God with a purpose. My little Be-Anne memorized this song already. God bless all His creation.

I haven't heard about this song, it's my first time but the song is easy-listening with rich meaning. How great Thou art, He create all creations on earth. Let every tongue and tribe sing Hallelujah! God bless.
I have never heard this song until now! Lovely! Praise God for all He has made! My daughter just told me to be sure to write that she loves this song too!
I love this song because God made everything!! Hallelujah!

My 4-yr old son Ezra Joseph (youngest of 3 kids) just loves this song so much. I make the music in hymnal.net as lullabye for my kids.
Ezra is always requesting for the song "In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth." Can't find it here. Can I request that it be included? Thanks so much. Amen.
Amen. God made man as His masterpiece, so we need to be vessels unto honor. Fill us, Lord Jesus. Praise the Lord.
